participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and independent, enjoys physical activities and has a practical outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and eager to break free from parental constraints, values friendships and enjoyment.
participant_2.background: i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i work took i've a part time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. they're constantly on my back.

content.text: Hi! It is nice to see you! How is your day going?
This is what happens when you don't have a job.
